timeline.message: More grammar correcting and making things more native

+waves.perspawn = per syntymispiste

replies.bodyText: From what I remember, that button spawns an unit and not a spawn point.
replies.author: valtsu41

replies.bodyText: (Though I think it is not used anymore)
replies.author: valtsu41
